list.name: Enderwork
list.description: An all-in-one configuration helping tool for Game Developers

features.title: Template Replacer
features.content: Allows configurators to use templates to create thousands of substitutes in an excel like interface.

features.title: Calculator Model
features.content: Multiple Calculators are implemented to solve simple calculation problems regarding arithmetic sequencing and sum of arithmetic sequences to evaluate the economic expenditure for game systems.

futurePlans.title: Calculator Model
futurePlans.content: Multiple Calculators are implemented to solve simple calculation problems regarding arithmetic sequencing and sum of arithmetic sequences to evaluate the economic expenditure for game systems.
